name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 423 — Fuel Preparation for Farm Maintenance
description:
On January 1, 2026 at 11:09, MaMeeFarm™ prepared fuel for grass-cutting operations within the farm.

This action represents a routine but essential maintenance step — ensuring that vegetation is managed so daily farm work can continue safely and effectively.

DGCP records not only visible outcomes, but also preparatory actions that make real work possible.

Every task, even before it begins, leaves verifiable evidence.
